summary: Project to improve UI/visual design and reorganize displayed information into clear sections (MGO/ST, Farmer, Crop).

existing_features.title: Apply a more attractive, consistent visual theme across the app (LoginPage, Header, FarmerForm, SettingsDialog) by improving typography (font family, heading hierarchy, spacing) and refining component styling while staying within the existing Tailwind + shadcn/ui patterns (no new product features).

Reorganize the FarmerForm UI into clearly separated sections: (1) MGO/ST info, (2) Farmer info, and (3) Crop info. Each section must have a visible section title and grouped fields, without changing existing validation rules or submission payload content.

Improve the FarmerForm layout responsiveness by using a structured layout (e.g., stacked on mobile, multi-column grid on larger screens) within each section to reduce vertical scrolling while keeping the current shadcn/ui components (Card, Input, Button, SearchableSelect) intact.

new_feature_requests.summary: Improve UI with more attractive design elements (e.g., better fonts, styling).
Reorganize information layout into separate sections: MGO/ST info, Farmer info, and Crop info.

projectName: Improve UI typography and reorganize the Farmer form into MGO/ST, Farmer, and Crop sections
